question: Which of the following statements about Hiuen-Tsang is not true?
option1: He visited India during the reign of Harshavardhana
option2: He spent some time at Nalanda University
option3: He advocated for strong Indo-China relations
answer: He advocated for strong Indo-China relations
explanation: Hiuen Tsang was the celebrated Chinese traveler who visited India in Ancient Times. He has been described therefore as the “Prince of Pilgrims.” His visit to India was an important event of the reign of Harshavardhana.
